osvSchema.details: Royal RoyalTSX before 6.0.2.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (Heap Memory Corruption and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a long hostname in an RTSZ file, if the victim clicks on Test Connection. This occurs during SecureGatewayHost object processing in RAPortCheck.createNWConnection.
